title: Decoding McDormand's mention of 'inclusion rider'
text:
Decoding McDormand's mention of 'inclusion rider' 3:48am EST - 01:52 
Few people watching Sunday night’s Oscars knew what Frances McDormand was talking about when she ended her Best Actress speech with the term 'inclusion rider,' sending viewers scrambling on search engines and social media to find out its meaning. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
